metadata.name: Launch-VsDevShell.PS1 Proxy Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the 'Launch-VsDevShell.ps1' Microsoft signed script to execute commands.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('launch-vsdevshell.ps1')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vswherepath ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vsinstallationpath '))))

output.summary: Detects the use of the 'Launch-VsDevShell.ps1' Microsoft signed script to execute commands.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of the script by a developer Reference: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1535981653239255040
